message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. How about $95? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to compromise at $110, which is still a good deal for both of us.
I'm really trying to make this work, Alice, but $110 is still too high for me.  If you're serious about selling, I'm willing to go up to $100. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I've already told you that I'm not willing to sell for $100. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer: $115, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
